segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let's talk about your job. What are your main objectives in, you know, your career right now?
segments.client_message: Right, um, so I'm just, like, looking to move up in my position at, uh, my current job. I wanna maybe take on more responsibilities, and, um, it's, like, really important to, I guess, develop my skills?

segments.advisor_message: That makes sense! What kind of responsibilities are you thinkin' about?
segments.client_message: Well, I mean, I would love to, you know, lead some projects. I feel like I have some good ideas. And also, like, maybe get some training in, um, management? That would really help me.
